metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1665 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ownCloud before 6.0.1 allowsremote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via thefilename of an uploaded file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1665` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2').
